subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Texans were second-guessed and publicly criticized for their 2006 draft choice.  Now with a new front office in place, there will be less pressure when the Texans pick 10th.
snippet: The Texans were second-guessed and publicly criticized for their 2006 draft choice.  Now with a new front office in place, there will be less pressure when the Texans pick 10th.
